attributes.action: not proceed with ratification of the Lisbon Treaty following the rejection of the treaty by Ireland.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This treaty appears to require agreement by ALL members of the EU. The Irish rejection means that further work on this Treaty is a pointless waste of resources.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
